column5: PERFECT for game days, graduations, & large families, looking to have a fun-filled and relaxing weekend! We take pride in providing our guests an incredible experience and stay. We are in a FANTASTIC location, located only a mile from the Texas A&M Campus! We have a homey atmosphere with all updated appliances, granite countertops, a very large kitchen, massive front yard, and charming deck for relaxing and socializing. This house is PERFECT for large families and groups to enjoy time together!
column8: Large Cozy Home-Quaint Neighborhood-1.2 Mi to A&M!
